text: @BarbMcQuade @detroitnews Mueller also lied and @MSNBC damn sure does so there's that. With that said, when you can prove someone dies from acquiring COVID19 by being at a protest, your post will have some merit, until then the only ones benefiting by demonizing them are @MSNBC, @CNN @TheDemocrats etc.
